definition: corner of the lower hem of a jacket etc
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He uses spit and cloths and ashes.
Rivets are arranged on the raincoat corners which can be fixed on the motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 雨衣角上带有铆钉，可与摩托车固定。

sentences.english: She wore a checked shirt tied in a knot above the navel.
sentences.chinese: 她身穿一件格子衬衫，衣角在肚脐上方打了个结。

sentences.english: So she might borrow a piece of clothing or jewelry from a friend or family member.
sentences.chinese: 于是，她可能会借用一个朋友或家庭成员的一片衣角。

sentences.english: Suddenly he had an intense desire to see what was tied in his cloth.
sentences.chinese: 突然间，他有强烈的欲望去看系在衣角上的是什么。

sentences.english: Or a timid creatures clinging to my mother's skirt.
sentences.chinese: 还是一个时常爱拽着妈妈衣角的胆小鬼。

sentences.english: That ell as if first meets you, the clothes angular divergence scatters fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 那气味彷佛初次遇上的你，衣角散涣的芳香。
